name: Jake Busey
title: Actor
bio: Busey has built a varied career in film and television with standout roles in movies like Starship Troopers and The Frighteners. Beyond acting, he loves to take on challenges that blend his rugged personality with adrenaline-fuelled adventure. This season, Busey brings his fearless approach to the Baja circuit, ready to tackle whatever the desert throws his way.

name: Robert Ri'chard
title: Actor / Producer
bio: Ri'chard is an actor and producer best known for his standout performances in Coach Carter, House of Wax, and the hit series One on One. With a career spanning over three decades, the Emmy winner has built a reputation for his versatility and drive. Now, he’s trading scripts for sand, channeling that same relentless energy as he joins Perilous to push his limits behind the wheel.

name: Cat Zingano
title: Actress / MMA Fighter
bio: Zingano rose to prominence as a four-time All-American collegiate wrestler, then transitioned into professional MMA. She competed in the Ultimate Fighting Championship and later in Bellator MMA. Now stepping into the high-stakes world of off-road racing, she brings the same unrelenting spirit that made her a standout in the cage.

name: Cowboy Cerrone
title: Actor / MMA Fighter
bio: Cerrone is a legendary name in mixed martial arts, known for his fearless fighting style and record-breaking career in the UFC. He has built a reputation for grit, charisma, and a relentless drive to push limits—on the mat and beyond. Transitioning into acting and now off-road competition, Cerrone is ready to conquer the desert with the same courage that made him a fan favorite in the ring.
